simplesect.para: 1 if equal ignoring ASCII case; 0 otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: NUL-terminated string; NULL is accepted and hashed to a fixed value.

simplesect.para: Non-zero 32-bit hash value (remapped if the result would be 0).

briefdescription.para: One step of a xorshift64* PRNG (period ≈ 2^64-1).

parameterdescription.para: In/out PRNG state. If zero, it is remapped to a fixed non-zero seed.

detaileddescription.para: The engine copies provided parameters by value. Unknown hints are ignored.

p
Optional parameters (may be NULL for defaults).
out
Output engine handle; must be non-NULL.
IE_OK
on success.
non-zero
on failure (resource error, invalid args, etc).
Create a new engine instance.

CI-friendly behavior:
Does not open or validate model files.
Fails only on allocation/invalid-argument errors.
“Model required” is enforced by the CLI when IE_REQUIRE_MODEL=1.

CI-friendly behavior:
Does not open or validate model files.
Fails only on allocation/invalid-argument errors.
“Model required” is enforced by the CLI when IE_REQUIRE_MODEL=1.

briefdescription.para: Destroy an engine and free its resources.

detaileddescription.para: Destroy an engine and free its resources.

h
Engine handle (may be NULL; no-op).
Destroy an engine and free its resources.

memberdef.argsstring: (ie_engine_t *h, const char *prompt, size_t max_new_tokens, uint32_t *out_tokens, uint32_t *out_count)
memberdef.name: ie_engine_generate

briefdescription.para: Generate up to max_new_tokens from prompt.

detaileddescription.para: Generate up to max_new_tokens from prompt.
Implementations may output fewer tokens (e.g., due to EOS). The caller owns the out_tokens buffer and must supply capacity for max_new_tokens.

h
Engine handle.
prompt
NUL-terminated prompt text.
max_new_tokens
Upper bound on tokens to produce.
out_tokens
Output buffer for token IDs (size >= max_new_tokens).
out_count
Number of tokens actually produced (<= max_new_tokens).
IE_OK
on success.
non-zero
on failure.
Generate up to max_new_tokens from prompt.

listitem.para: If max_new_tokens == 0, nothing is written and *out_count becomes 0.
On success, *out_count equals the number of tokens produced (≤ max).
Output is deterministic for identical (engine seed, prompt).
If max_new_tokens == 0, nothing is written and *out_count becomes 0.
On success, *out_count equals the number of tokens produced (≤ max).
Output is deterministic for identical (engine seed, prompt).

detaileddescription.para: The caller should zero-initialize out before calling to preserve forward compatibility.

h
Engine handle (const).
out
Output struct; must be non-NULL.
IE_OK
on success.
non-zero
on failure (invalid args, etc).
Snapshot engine metrics into out.

briefdescription.para: CI-friendly implementation of the public Inference Engine API.

detaileddescription.para: This translation unit implements the minimal, header-compliant behavior defined in ie_api.h. It keeps the core simple and deterministic so all unit tests and CLI smoke tests pass without requiring external GPU drivers or model files. The CLI layer (see main_infer.c) enforces "real model required" gating via the environment/config when desired.
